name: AR Game: Alice
description:
Book pages and application download links:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-mTqP30p6Vp4ODmm82eyGLA_PN4-ttPF/view?usp=shari...

This game is adapted from Lewis Carroll's Alice in Wonderland. It tells a series of fantasy stories after Alice chased a rabbit with a pocket watch and fell into a hole.

Based on modern interactive media technology and art, the game design intends to interpret this classic children's literature work in a brand-new form.  By using AR game technology and dynamic images, the game aims to improve children’s participation during reading. Meanwhile, it is also equipped with reading and music to help children understand the fun of the story by listening and watching. Of course, the audience of this game is not limited to children readers. Players of all ages can experience Alice's story again in AR as long as they make simple interaction via mobile phones.
